    • Method Detail

      • parse

        public String parse​(boolean nameRequired,
                    boolean dropSpec)
             throws QueryException
        Parse the index specification, throwing an exception if something's wrong. Returns the index name string, if any. If a name is required, pass true for nameRequired and an exception will be thrown if a name isn't found.
        Throws:
        QueryException

      • parse

        public String parse()
             throws QueryException
        Parse the index specification, throwing an exception if something's wrong. Returns the index name string, which is always required.
        Throws:
        QueryException
